q.description: A string to search for, if omitted all content is returned

after.description: Returns only content published after this date. The date is formatted YYYYMMDD

before.description: Returns only content published before this date. The date is formatted YYYYMMDD

content-type.description: The type of content to return e.g article, audio, gallery, poll etc.

count.description: Specifies how many items to return as part of this query, if omitted 10 results will be returned

start-index.description: Allows pagination through results by specifying which result to start from

and-filter.description: Returns only results that match the given subject filter(s). Multiple subject filters can be applied. Valid values can be obtained using the all-subjects endpoint.

orderbydate.description: Returns the results in date order, rather than relevance order. Takes an optional value of desc, which reverses the order.

subjects.name: Search for subjects
subjects.description: Search for subjects within the API

q.description: A string to search for, if omitted all subjects are returned

count.description: Specifies how many items to return as part of this query, if omitted 10 results will be returned

start-index.description: Allows pagination through results by specifying which result to start from

content.name: content item
content.description: Returns the full details of an individual item of content. Every content item listed in the search results provides the url at which to get the individual content item.
